name: 雙語教材教法（教）
description: 本課程旨在介紹雙語教學的定義及理念、語言使用、教學與評量、教學現場概況、以及實例分析。課程內容將以探討雙語教學的相關研究以及實際案例為主，期能發展中等教育階段師培生的雙語教學知能，增進其未來雙語教學的效能。
goals: 認識不同雙語教學法的核心理念與了解全球雙語教育實施概況。
認識英語為國際通用語的概念，發展跨語言教學知能。
提升教師授課語言及課室溝通與互動的效能。
根據課綱及學科內容、語言、認知能力及情境脈絡，設計雙與課程、教學活動及學習評量。
syllabus:
**Course Description**

This 2-credit course is designed to introduce materials, methods, and techniques for teaching in bilingual classrooms. Participants will explore and evaluate materials and resources available in the field, develop lesson planning skills, and demonstrate bilingual teaching methods.

**Required Text**

Echevarria, J., Vogt, M., Short, D. J. (2017). _Making content comprehensible for English learners: The SIOP model_ (5th ed.). Pearson. ISBN: 9780134045238

You may purchase the textbook from:

[https://www.books.com.tw/](https://www.books.com.tw/)

[https://www.amazon.com/](https://www.amazon.com/)

[https://www.cavesbooks.com.tw/EC/](https://www.cavesbooks.com.tw/EC/)

**Guidelines for Assignments**

1.  **Self-Introduction**

(1) Upload your Chinese and English resumes to Moodle

(2) Upload a video link to Moodle

*   The video should be less than 1 minute and in English
*   Here is how to make an UNLISTED (非公開)YouTube video:

[https://speak2015.innovarad.tw/youtube/](https://speak2015.innovarad.tw/youtube/)

[https://wiki.umbc.edu/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=31198917](https://wiki.umbc.edu/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=31198917)

(3) Make 3 responses (either in Chinese or English) to your classmates’ postings, starting with those who have not got a response yet.

1.  **Online Discussion (1 question + 3 responses)**

(1) Post a question for deeper discussion to Moodle.

(2) Make 3 responses (either in Chinese or English) to your classmates’ postings, starting with those who have not got a response yet. 

(3) Optional: Post the muddy points (the parts that you don’t understand in the book chapter).

   Please provide the page number.

(4) Copy your question(s) and the 3 responses to your e-portfolio.

1.  **Group Presentation (20 minutes)**

Prepare a presentation about the book chapter content for about 20 minutes.

1.  **Final Project: Classroom Observation or Interview (Individual/Group of 2-5; 15 minutes)**

(1) Choose a participant (a bilingual teacher) for your classroom observation or interview.

(2) Contact the teacher and make an appointment for the classroom observation or interview.

(3) Prepare a thank-you card before you visit the teacher.

(4) Conduct the classroom observation (Appendix 1) or interview (Appendix 2).

 (5) Compile your notes and prepare PPT slides for the oral presentation (either in Chinese or English). Here is the outline of your presentation (15 minutes).

          (a) Introduction: Rationale and background (the school, the teacher, and the students)

          (b) Findings from the classroom observation or interview

          (c) Conclusion and reflection

          (d) Appendix 1 (Classroom Observation) or Appendix 2 (Interview)
